landing.how: Stop rummaging in the cupboard, start enjoying easy homemade cuisine
landing.how-description: Otchi encourages you to create easy, healthy meals that your lifestyle
landing.what-description: Discover, save and share your favorite recipes when you join otchi
landing.what-description-1: individualized suggestions according to your search history and what you have in your fridge
landing.what-description-2: with user friendly features and tips for success at every step
landing.what-description-3: new ideas with others; inspire and be inspired
landing.join-us: Follow otchi on facebook and join our community
